languages.text: {n}Вы внимательно изучаете пульсирующую массу плоти. Создание в клетке словно состоит из нескольких тел, сплавленных между собой. Вы не замечаете ни швов, ни других методов соединения отдельных частей. Среди наслоений мяса узнаются крупные узлы мышц, отдельные конечности, обнаженные кости, части лиц и целые головы... только {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп-колдовство{/g} способно создать такое чудовище, сохранив ему способность жить дальше.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы внимательно изучаете пульсирующую массу плоти. Создание в клетке словно состоит из нескольких тел, сплавленных между собой. Вы не замечаете ни швов, ни других методов соединения отдельных частей. Среди наслоений мяса узнаются крупные узлы мышц, отдельные конечности, обнаженные кости, части лиц и целые головы... только {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп-колдовство{/g} способно создать такое чудовище, сохранив ему способность жить дальше.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You examine the pulsating mass of flesh. The creature in the cage seems to be composed of several bodies joined together. You see no sutures or any other means by which the separate parts could have been connected. Among the layers of meat, you can discern large knots of muscle, various limbs, exposed bones, parts of faces, and entire heads... Only {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery is capable of creating such an abomination while preserving its ability to live on.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы внимательно изучаете пульсирующую массу плоти. Создание в клетке словно состоит из нескольких тел, сплавленных между собой. Вы не замечаете ни швов, ни других методов соединения отдельных частей. Среди наслоений мяса узнаются крупные узлы мышц, отдельные конечности, обнаженные кости, части лиц и целые головы... только {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп-колдовство{/g} способно создать такое чудовище, сохранив ему способность жить дальше.{/n}

You see no sutures or any other means by which the separate parts could have been connected. Among the layers of meat, you can discern large knots of muscle, various limbs, exposed bones, parts of faces, and entire heads... Only warp sorcery is capable of creating such an abomination while preserving its ability to live on.{/n}

You see no sutures or any other means by which the separate parts could have been connected. Among the layers of meat, you can discern large knots of muscle, various limbs, exposed bones, parts of faces, and entire heads... Only {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery is capable of creating such an abomination while preserving its ability to live on.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你检查着这座抽搐的肉山。笼子里的生物似乎是由多个人的身体连在一起拼接而成的。你并没有看到缝线，也没看到其他用来将这些肢体拼接在一起的手段。在层层叠叠的肉中，你看到了大块肌肉、各种肢体、裸露的骨头、一部分脸，以及许多颗完整的头……只有{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的巫术才能制造出这么恐怖的怪物，并保障它可以生存下去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You examine the pulsating mass of flesh. The creature in the cage seems to be composed of several bodies joined together. You see no sutures or any other means by which the separate parts could have been connected. Among the layers of meat, you can discern large knots of muscle, various limbs, exposed bones, parts of faces, and entire heads... Only {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery is capable of creating such an abomination while preserving its ability to live on.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你检查着这座抽搐的肉山。笼子里的生物似乎是由多个人的身体连在一起拼接而成的。你并没有看到缝线，也没看到其他用来将这些肢体拼接在一起的手段。在层层叠叠的肉中，你看到了大块肌肉、各种肢体、裸露的骨头、一部分脸，以及许多颗完整的头……只有{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的巫术才能制造出这么恐怖的怪物，并保障它可以生存下去。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Examinas la masa de carne palpitante. La criatura de la jaula parece estar compuesta de varios cuerpos unidos. No ves suturas ni ningún otro indicio que te permita identificar cómo se han combinado. Entre las capas de carne puedes distinguir grandes nudos de músculo, distintas extremidades, huesos al descubierto, partes de rostros y cabezas completas... Solo la hechicería {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disforme{/g} es capaz de crear tal abominación y permitir que siga con vida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You examine the pulsating mass of flesh. The creature in the cage seems to be composed of several bodies joined together. You see no sutures or any other means by which the separate parts could have been connected. Among the layers of meat, you can discern large knots of muscle, various limbs, exposed bones, parts of faces, and entire heads... Only {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery is capable of creating such an abomination while preserving its ability to live on.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Examinas la masa de carne palpitante. La criatura de la jaula parece estar compuesta de varios cuerpos unidos. No ves suturas ni ningún otro indicio que te permita identificar cómo se han combinado. Entre las capas de carne puedes distinguir grandes nudos de músculo, distintas extremidades, huesos al descubierto, partes de rostros y cabezas completas... Solo la hechicería {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disforme{/g} es capaz de crear tal abominación y permitir que siga con vida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは脈打つ肉塊を調べる。檻の中の生き物は、いくつかの体をつなぎ合わせたもののようだ。縫合糸も、あるいは他のどのような手段で別々の部分をつないだのかも見えない。幾重にも重なった肉の中に、筋肉の大きな節、さまざまな手足、むき出しになった骨、顔の一部、頭全体が見えた。このような醜悪なものを、生存能力を保たせながら作ることができるのは、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の魔術だけだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You examine the pulsating mass of flesh. The creature in the cage seems to be composed of several bodies joined together. You see no sutures or any other means by which the separate parts could have been connected. Among the layers of meat, you can discern large knots of muscle, various limbs, exposed bones, parts of faces, and entire heads... Only {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery is capable of creating such an abomination while preserving its ability to live on.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは脈打つ肉塊を調べる。檻の中の生き物は、いくつかの体をつなぎ合わせたもののようだ。縫合糸も、あるいは他のどのような手段で別々の部分をつないだのかも見えない。幾重にも重なった肉の中に、筋肉の大きな節、さまざまな手足、むき出しになった骨、顔の一部、頭全体が見えた。このような醜悪なものを、生存能力を保たせながら作ることができるのは、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の魔術だけだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du untersuchst die pulsierende Fleischmasse. Die Kreatur im Käfig scheint aus mehreren Körpern zu bestehen, die miteinander verbunden wurden. Du siehst keine Nähte oder andere Methoden, mit denen die Einzelteile zusammengefügt wurden. In den Fleischschichten entdeckst du große Muskelknoten, verschiedene Gliedmaßen, freiliegende Knochen, Teile von Gesichtern und ganze Köpfe ... Nur {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Zauberei kann eine solche Abscheulichkeit erschaffen und ihre Fähigkeit zum Weiterleben bewahren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You examine the pulsating mass of flesh. The creature in the cage seems to be composed of several bodies joined together. You see no sutures or any other means by which the separate parts could have been connected. Among the layers of meat, you can discern large knots of muscle, various limbs, exposed bones, parts of faces, and entire heads... Only {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery is capable of creating such an abomination while preserving its ability to live on.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du untersuchst die pulsierende Fleischmasse. Die Kreatur im Käfig scheint aus mehreren Körpern zu bestehen, die miteinander verbunden wurden. Du siehst keine Nähte oder andere Methoden, mit denen die Einzelteile zusammengefügt wurden. In den Fleischschichten entdeckst du große Muskelknoten, verschiedene Gliedmaßen, freiliegende Knochen, Teile von Gesichtern und ganze Köpfe ... Nur {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Zauberei kann eine solche Abscheulichkeit erschaffen und ihre Fähigkeit zum Weiterleben bewahren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous examinez la masse de chair palpitante dans la cage. Elle semble être constituée d'un amalgame de plusieurs corps, mais vous ne voyez pas de points de suture ou toute autre indication de ce qui a permis de les assembler. Parmi les couches de chair, vous discernez de gros amas musculaires, divers membres, des os à nu, des parties de visages et des têtes entières... Seule la sorcellerie du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} est capable de créer une telle abomination et de la maintenir en vie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You examine the pulsating mass of flesh. The creature in the cage seems to be composed of several bodies joined together. You see no sutures or any other means by which the separate parts could have been connected. Among the layers of meat, you can discern large knots of muscle, various limbs, exposed bones, parts of faces, and entire heads... Only {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery is capable of creating such an abomination while preserving its ability to live on.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous examinez la masse de chair palpitante dans la cage. Elle semble être constituée d'un amalgame de plusieurs corps, mais vous ne voyez pas de points de suture ou toute autre indication de ce qui a permis de les assembler. Parmi les couches de chair, vous discernez de gros amas musculaires, divers membres, des os à nu, des parties de visages et des têtes entières... Seule la sorcellerie du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} est capable de créer une telle abomination et de la maintenir en vie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yürek gibi çarpan et yığınını inceliyorsun. Kafesteki yaratık, görünüşe göre birkaç bedenin birleşiminden meydana gelmiş. Ayrı uzuvların birleştirildiği yerlerde dikiş izi veya başka bir belirti göremiyorsun. Et katmanları arasında kastan düğümler, çeşitli uzuvlar, açıkta kemikler, yüz parçaları ve bütün kafalar... Böylesi bir garabeti yaratıp yaşamasını sağlayacak tek şey, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} sahirliğidir.{/n}
